Description.Text:
1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartments - some with balcony. All with clean lines, airy spaciousness and close attention to detail. Each modern apartment boasts a range of facilities for your comfort including a fully equipped kitchen with washing machine and dishwasher. Spacious combined living and dining area complete with colour TV and DVD player and double bedrooms. Maximum occupancy: 3 bed apartments sleep up to 6 people (double bed). Standard 2 bed apartment sleeps 4 people (2 double bed). Executive 2 bed apartments sleep up to 5 people (double bed. sofa bed for 5th person on request ). In some 2 bedroom apartments twin beds are available (subject to availability).
1 bed apartment sleeps up to 2 people (double bed).
Optional extras (charged and subject to availability) : Garage parking, Breakfast pack, Broadband, Cot (Please note that bedding for cot is not provided), Extra bed (sofa bed/camp bed), Early check in, Late check out.
PLEASE NOTE: Before arrival at the apartments, all guests will be asked to provide a valid credit card as security. This will be held to insure against damage being caused to the apartment and any extras requested.

Hamilton development is superbly located for the university, the BBC, the BRI hospital and Bristol city centre, just a couple of hundred metres from new Cabot Circus shopping centre with easy access to all the exclusive shops, restaurants and bars. Some of Bristol's most popular leisure attractions are within short walking distance of the apartments including the waterfront, Hippodrome and the award winning and Brunnel's historic and award winning SS Great Britain. The M32 and the national motorway network are 0.5 miles away and central bus station with airport bus stops near by which make this a great choice when staying in Bristol.

2 Bedroom Superior Apartment - Weekly Maid Service and linen change (every 7 days). All apartments are non-smoking. Books and DVD's. Secure entry system. Microwave, fridge freezer and washer dryer. Cutlery, crockery, glasses and kitchen utensils. Television, DVD player and music centre. Bedding and towels for each guest. Business or holiday rental. Welcome pack. Dishwasher. Hairdryer. Flat screen TV/ Free-view.
Optional extras (charged and subject to availability) : Garage parking, Breakfast pack, Broadband, Cot (Please note that bedding for cot is not provided), Extra bed (sofa bed/camp bed), Early check in, Late check out.
Superior Apartment offers two double beds or 1 double bed and twin beds in the second bedroom (twin beds subject to availability) and 2 bathrooms.
1 Bedroom Contemporary Apartment - Weekly Maid Service and linen change (every 7 days). All apartments are non-smoking. Books and DVD's. Secure entry system. Microwave, fridge freezer and washer dryer. Cutlery, crockery, glasses and kitchen utensils. Television, DVD player and music centre. Bedding and towels for each guest. Business or holiday rental. Welcome pack. Hairdryer. Flat screen TV/ Free-view.
Optional extras (charged and subject to availability) : Garage parking, Breakfast pack, Broadband, Cot (Please note that bedding for cot is not provided), Extra bed (sofa bed/camp bed), Early check in, Late check out.
Apartment offers one double bed and 1 bathroom.
3 Bedroom Contemporary Apartment - Weekly Maid Service and linen change (every 7 days). All apartments are non-smoking. Books and DVD's. Secure entry system. Microwave, fridge freezer and washer dryer. Cutlery, crockery, glasses and kitchen utensils. Television, DVD player and music centre. Bedding and towels for each guest. Business or holiday rental. Welcome pack. Dishwasher. Hairdryer. Flat screen TV/ Free-view.
Optional extras (charged and subject to availability) : Garage parking, Breakfast pack, Broadband, Cot (Please note that bedding for cot is not provided), Extra bed (sofa bed/camp bed), Early check in, Late check out.
This 3 bedroom Apartment has 3 double beds and 2 bathrooms. Extra bed available for non sharers (max occupancy 6 persons).
2 Bedroom Contemporary Apartment - Weekly Maid Service and linen change (every 7 days). All apartments are non-smoking. Books and DVD's. Secure entry system. Microwave, fridge freezer and washer dryer. Cutlery, crockery, glasses and kitchen utensils. Television, DVD player and music centre. Bedding and towels for each guest. Business or holiday rental. Welcome pack. Dishwasher. Hairdryer. Flat screen TV/ Free-view.
Optional extras (charged and subject to availability) : Garage parking, Breakfast pack, Broadband, Cot (Please note that bedding for cot is not provided), Extra bed (sofa bed/camp bed), Early check in, Late check out.
Standard 2 bedroom Apartment has two double beds and 1 bathroom.
